name: Don't Play With Me
description:
“I want to meet someone, but I’m tired of playing games...”

After reading a manual of seduction for rabbits, a computer game imagines what it would be like to play the game of love. You are playing a cute rabbit whose goal is to seduce the game.

Made during the Global Game Jam 2013 by Brice Clocher, Kay Fleck, Greta Hoffmann, Vivian Maas, Rémi Papillié.
